sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(m : n = 7 : 3 \), then find \((8 m + 3 n ):(8 m + 8 n )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " $$\text{
 It is given that }$$
\[
 m : n = 7 : 3 
\]
$$\text(We need to find the value of )$$\
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} m + 3 n }{8 m + \input[s1v2]{} n }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{8 m }{n } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} m }{n } + 8 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 8 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{3 } \right ) + 3 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{7 }{3 } \right) + 8 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 9 }{3 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 24 }{3 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{56 + 9 }{56 + 24 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{16 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 $$\text{
 So, the answer is $13 : 16 $.}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [8, 8], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [3, 8], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by n, we get the expression} \frac{ \frac{8 m }{n } + 3 }{\frac{8 m }{n } + 8 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [7, 8], "text": " $$ \text{Substitute the given ratio of m:n = 7:3, to get the expression $\frac{ 8 \left (\frac{7 }{3 } \right ) + 3 }{8 \left(\frac{7 }{3 } ight) + 8 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [56, 56], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression $\frac{\frac{56 + 9 }{3 }}{\frac{56 + 24 }{3 }}$
, after which multiplying both numerator and denomiator by 7 \text{, we get} \frac{56 + 9 }{56 + 24 }} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [13], "text": " 
 $$ 	ext{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer \frac{13 }{16 }. $$"}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
